entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy 10 (HD Remaster) (PS3, 2014) (7)
entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy 10 (HD Remaster) (PS3, 2014) (7)20150131
I played for a long time today. I got Rikku and made it to the
Thunderplains. I am getting hammered in the fights. It is really
annoying to have so few Ability spheres and it is annoying to
constantly have to rotate everyone into every fight. Basically the
only thing interesting about the combat system is figuring out how
to make the enemy last as long as possible and still survive.

Total time: 15:30
  • Video Games
  • Final Fantasy 10 (HD Remaster)
  • PS3
  • 2014

entry.title: The X-Files - Season 1 - Episode 9 - Space
entry.content:
The X-Files - Season 1 - Episode 9 - Space20150131
This was a very one-note episode with a very simple theme and not
a lot going on. It tried to mix the subtle drama of a space
mission with a very minor paranormal thing that ultimately goes
nowhere in the series.
  • TV Shows
  • The X-Files

entry.title: Book: Frankenstein; or, The Modern Prometheus, by Mary Shelley (1818) (2)
entry.content:
Book: Frankenstein; or, The Modern Prometheus, by Mary Shelley (1818) (2)20150131
This is such a weird book. Almost nothing happens in it
generally. I'm at the start of chapter 9 and the "creature" is
basically absent, aside from Victor think it is gross and then
blaming it for something he has no actual reason to believe it did.
  • Books
  • 1818

entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy 10 (HD Remaster) (PS3, 2014) (6)
entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy 10 (HD Remaster) (PS3, 2014) (6)20150130
I played for about two and a half hours and got through the next
big Sinspawn fight. It was a little hard to pay attention to the
story so I lost some of the context. I like that you can tell
something is up with Seymour but not specifically that he'll be
the "big bad".

entry.title: Game: Divinity: Original Sin (Steam, 2014) (4)
entry.content:
Game: Divinity: Original Sin (Steam, 2014) (4)20150129
I explored throughout the beach and finally found where Esmeralda
lives. It was fun to fight the Orcs... lots of neat fights. It was
also crazy to explore the cave. I am about to try and fight the
Source Abomination, which looks crazy. I'm very excited about
getting to level 7 and putting "Glass Cannon" on my mage.

Total time: 16:55
  • Video Games
  • Divinity: Original Sin
  • Steam
  • 2014

entry.title: Game: Divinity: Original Sin (Steam, 2014) (3)
entry.content:
Game: Divinity: Original Sin (Steam, 2014) (3)20150128
I played for a little bit and beat a bunch of fights. I read about
what makes the difficulty levels different and since the AI is the
same, I just moved it down to Normal because I'm not interested in
masochism. The game is very fun, but it feels a little bit too
lame to be able to poke and prod and try different things rather
than being forced to commit to a path.

Total time: 14:49
  • Video Games
  • Divinity: Original Sin
  • Steam
  • 2014

entry.title: Movie: John Wick, starring Keanu Reeves (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: John Wick, starring Keanu Reeves (2014)20150128
This was kind of a weird movie. The plot was very sparse and the
action was pretty meh... he was certainly good at executing his
task, but it wasn't that interesting or different than normal
fights. I fell asleep near the end because it was late.
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.content:
Movie: G.I. Joe: Retaliation, starring Dwayne Johnson (2013) (2)20150128
We watched this because it came with the Ultra HD TV that my
parents bought. It was fine the second time around and the effects
were pretty awesome, particular in UHD.
  • Movies
  • 2013

entry.title: Game: Divinity: Original Sin (Steam, 2014) (2)
entry.content:
Game: Divinity: Original Sin (Steam, 2014) (2)20150127
I played for another six hours. I beat a lot more battles and
explored some more. There are lots of annoying micro-managing
things in the game. For instance, I wish I could just "optimize"
their equipment with a button and I don't like that the two
characters have separate inventories. The game seems designed for
doing Quicksave/load, which feels lame and is too slow. I feel
like there's a huge amount of pressure to pick the right set of
spells, which is maddening because it's so complicated to find
them and keep track of what I want. I am having fun with the game
though, I just feel like it could be way more efficient.

Total time: 12:14
  • Video Games
  • Divinity: Original Sin
  • Steam
  • 2014

entry.title: Movie: Lucy, starring Scarlett Johansson (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: Lucy, starring Scarlett Johansson (2014)20150127
This was a very beautiful movie with many cool moments. The premise
was of course crazy, but so is Lord of the Rings. I loved the
ending and all the artistic flourishes.
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.title: Game: Divinity: Original Sin (Steam, 2014)
entry.content:
Game: Divinity: Original Sin (Steam, 2014)20150126
I played this for a long time and explored around a little. I'm
playing on Hard with two Lone Wolf characters. One will be tank
and one will be a wizard with a variety of spells. I'm not sure if
this is wise, but I'll try to stick with it. I would feel much
better about this game if you could re-spec. So far I've basically
done nothing in the game except wander around.

Total time: 6:29

  • Divinity: Original Sin
  • Steam

entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy 10 (HD Remaster) (PS3, 2014) (5)20150125
I played for about an hour and a half. I beat the Chocobo Eater
and then went back through the Highroad so I could gather Ability
Spheres. I finally used some stuff on the Sphere Grid, so I now
feel a lot of pressure to get lots of spheres. I feel pretty
overpowered now though, which is kind of fun.

entry.content:

movies, including Terminator 2 (IIRC). It was pretty intense and
creepy.

entry.content:
Movie: Runner Runner, starring Justin Timberlake (2013)20150124
Justin didn't act as well as he can in this movie. The girl was a
major babe and the plot was pretty fun.
  • Movies
  • 2013

entry.title: Movie: Lone Survivor, starring Mark Wahlberg (2013)
entry.content:
Movie: Lone Survivor, starring Mark Wahlberg (2013)20150124
This was an amazing movie. The opening was so powerful and I almost
cried. I think it is so great that the Americans were so noble and
wouldn't break the rules in the fight. It was so crazy how the
SEALs kept jumping off mountains as a way to get away. And it is so
impressive how much damage they did to the other side. I cried at
the end as he was rescued.
  • Movies
  • 2013

entry.content:
Book: Flash Boys: A Wall Street Revolt, by Michael Lewis (2014) (2)20150124

course, it just ends with the story not complete, but that's the
way the world goes!

entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy 10 (HD Remaster) (PS3, 2014) (4)
entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy 10 (HD Remaster) (PS3, 2014) (4)20150120
I played for an hour and got to the next save point and played a
game of Blitzball. I'm trying to rotate all my characters through
every battle and I haven't yet done any upgrading. I got pretty
beat up by the end and had to run from battles to make it
through. I feel like I need to go back over the area to make sure
I get all the experience from that stretch of road. I'm very
unsure of how to spend upgrade points.

Total time: 8:04
  • Video Games
  • Final Fantasy 10 (HD Remaster)
  • PS3
  • 2014
